title: Spintires-CODEX
description:
Spintires (c) Oovee Game Studios

Release Date :  6/2014                        Protection : Steam
Discs        :  1                              Genre      : Adventure

Take responsibility of operating large all-terrain Soviet vehicles
and venture across the rugged landscapes with only a map and compass
to guide you. Explore the levels and unlock portions of the map
whilst discovering new trucks, fuelling stations, garages and
lumber mills

- Extract
- Burn or mount the .iso
- Run setup.exe and install
- Copy crack from CODEX folder to your installdir
- Play

Block game exe in your firewall to prevent the game from trying to go
online

CODEX is currently looking for

nothing but competition
